pkgmetadata.longdescription: Peptide Array Analysis Tools // Analyze Peptide Array Data and characterize peptide sequence space. Allows for high level visualization of global signal, Quality control based on replicate correlation and/or relative Kd, calculation of peptide Length/Charge/Kd parameters, Hits selection based on RFU Signal, and amino acid composition/basic motif recognition with RFU signal weighting. Basic signal trends can be used to generate peptides that follow the observed compositional trends.
